Whilst viruses can cause tissue damage by direct cytopathic effects on the infected cells, morbidity and mortality in severe disease are typically attributable to the host inflammatory response, including in COVID‐19.
57 AZM and other macrolides have a number of immunomodulatory properties which have proven clinical efficacy in a broad range of respiratory diseases including asthma,
29 COPD,
58 post lung transplant obliterative bronchiolitis
59 and diffuse pan bronchiolitis (DPB).
